p: MARC-145 tissue culture cells were grown in DMEM containing 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco) and 1% penicillin/streptomycin and incubated at 37 °C in a 5% CO 2 atmosphere. To produce inoculated cells, PRRSV (VR2332 North American genotype) was propagated in MARC-145 cells, and virus titer was quantified using IPMA.
